## This session

In this session, you will complete the following tasks:

1. Read the [chapter "Command Line"](https://lennartwittkuhn.com/version-control-book/chapters/command-line.html) of the Version Control
1. Complete the exercises for the [`recipes` project](#recipes-project).
1. Complete the quiz questions / exercises in the [Command Line survey](https://version-control-cli.formr.org).

As always:

1. Try out the commands in the chapter and play around with them.
1. Check whether you have achieved the [learning objectives](#learning-objectives).

## `recipes` project

At the end of this session, you should have accomplished the following:

1. You used the command line to create a folder on your computer called `recipes`.
1. You used the command line to create a file called `recipes.txt` inside the `recipes` folder.

Please keep the `recipes` folder!
We will continue to use it in the following sessions.
